about_the_game:
Dive into Political Party Frenzy, the ultimate casual puzzler with a patriotic twist, full of the charm and wit of Americana. Master the challenges, tackle hundreds of scandals, compete on leaderboards, and enjoy the wild antics of American politics. Can you lead your party to the top?

  • Casual yet Competitive: Whether you're playing for fun, shooting for the top of the leaderboards, or entertained by the latest scandal, Political Party Frenzy mixes strategy with a dash of competative spirit.

  • Scandals Galore: From shady donations to awkward selfies, 400 scandalous puzzles await your mastery!

  • Relax with Benefits: Political Party Frenzy playfully pokes fun at American politics, offering laughs, a little learning, and endless fun you won’t want to put down.

  • Flip States: Use your influence to flip states red or blue and reshape America’s virtual political landscape.

  • Equal Opportunity Fun: Whether you lean left or right, there’s something for everyone. No political figures were harmed (or impeached) in the making of this game!

  • Game Modes & Challenges: Explore endless ways to grow your followers and outplay your rivals!

  • Integrated Voting System: Share your opinions and see how all 400 scandals are trending in real time.

  • Global Leaderboards: Compete on state leaderboards, challenge friends in private battles, and fight for your political party.

  • In-app purchases: Enjoy the game with no ads or banners, and boost your strategy with the in-app store.
